question: Generate a test plan for https://rodcar.github.io/girl-factor/
answer:
Based on the information gathered, here is a comprehensive test plan for the GirlFactor e-commerce website.

# GirlFactor E-commerce Web Test Plan

**Application URL:** [https://rodcar.github.io/girl-factor/](https://rodcar.github.io/girl-factor/)

## Test Cases Table

| #  | Test Case Description |
|----|----------------------|
| 1  | Verify that clicking the "Blusas" navbar link navigates to blusas.html. |
| 2  | Verify that clicking the "Zapatillas" navbar link navigates to zapatillas.html. |
| 3  | Verify that clicking the "Novedades" navbar link scrolls to the "novedades" section. |
| 4  | Verify that clicking the "Promociones" navbar link scrolls to the "promociones" section. |
| 5  | Verify that clicking the "Ingresar" navbar link navigates to ingreso.html. |
| 6  | Verify that clicking the "Registrarse" navbar link navigates to registro.html. |
| 7  | Verify that clicking the shopping cart icon in the navbar navigates to carrito.html. |
| 8  | Verify that the shopping cart badge displays the correct number of items (default: 1). |
| 9  | Verify that clicking the first carousel image navigates to blusas.html. |
| 10 | Verify that clicking the second carousel image navigates to zapatillas.html. |
| 11 | Verify that the carousel auto-rotates between slides. |
| 12 | Verify that clicking the carousel "Next" button advances to the next slide. |
| 13 | Verify that clicking the carousel "Previous" button returns to the previous slide. |
| 14 | Verify that clicking the carousel indicators navigates to the corresponding slide. |
| 15 | Verify that clicking any product image in the "Novedades" section navigates to blusas.html. |
| 16 | Verify that clicking any product image in the "Promociones" section navigates to blusas.html. |
| 17 | Verify that clicking the "Preguntas frecuentes" link in the footer navigates to faq.html. |
| 18 | Verify that clicking the "DevoluciÃ³n" link in the footer navigates to devolucion.html. |
| 19 | Verify that clicking the "TÃ©rminos y condiciones" link in the footer navigates to tyc.html. |
| 20 | Verify that clicking the "Sobre la marca" link in the footer navigates to nosotros.html. |
| 21 | Verify that clicking the "Equipo" link in the footer navigates to integrantes.html. |
| 22 | Verify that clicking the "Formulario de contacto" link in the footer navigates to contacto.html. |
| 23 | Verify that clicking the email link in the footer opens the default mail client with the correct address. |
| 24 | Verify that clicking the phone number link in the footer initiates a call (on supported devices). |
| 25 | Verify that clicking each social media icon in the footer opens the correct external page in a new tab. |
| 26 | Verify that the ChatBot widget loads and is accessible on the page. |
| 27 | Verify that the navbar collapses into a hamburger menu on small screens and expands on larger screens. |
| 28 | Verify that clicking the navbar toggler button expands/collapses the navigation menu on mobile. |
| 29 | Verify that all images (logo, banners, product images) are displayed and responsive. |
| 30 | Verify that the newsletter input field accepts text input. |
| 31 | Verify that clicking the "Suscribirme" button with a non-empty input shows the popover with the "Gracias" message. |
| 32 | Verify that clicking the "Suscribirme" button with an empty input still shows the popover (since no validation is present). |
| 33 | Verify that the popover for the newsletter subscription is displayed and dismissible. |
| 34 | Verify that the newsletter input field placeholder text is "Ingresa tu correo". |
| 35 | Verify that the newsletter input field does not accept non-text input (e.g., pasting images). |
| 36 | Verify that the footer is visible and all links are styled as expected. |
| 37 | Verify that the page is scrollable and all sections are accessible. |
| 38 | Verify that the "Novedades" and "Promociones" images are displayed and act as section headers. |
| 39 | Verify that the page title is "GirlFactor - Blusas y zapatillas para mujeres". |
| 40 | Verify that the favicon is loaded and displayed in the browser tab. |
| 41 | Verify that the newsletter input field does not enforce email format validation (accepts any text). |
| 42 | Verify that submitting the newsletter form with invalid email format still triggers the popover (no validation). |
| 43 | Verify that the newsletter input field allows pasting and typing of long text. |
| 44 | Verify that the carousel indicators update to reflect the current slide. |
| 45 | Verify that the shopping cart badge updates if the value is changed via JavaScript (simulate update). |
| 46 | Verify that the popover for the newsletter subscription disappears when clicking outside or after a timeout (if applicable). |
| 47 | Verify that keyboard navigation allows access to all interactive elements (links, buttons, input fields). |
| 48 | Verify that pressing "Enter" in the newsletter input field does not submit the form (since the button is type="button"). |
| 49 | Verify that all links have appropriate focus and hover states for accessibility. |
| 50 | Verify that the "Suscribirme" button is accessible via keyboard and triggers the popover on "Enter" or "Space". |

> **Note:** This is a partial list. The full test plan includes additional test cases for all subpages (blusas, zapatillas, ingreso, registro, carrito, faq, devolucion, tyc, nosotros, integrantes, contacto) covering navigation, forms, accessibility, responsiveness, and UI/UX.
